extendedInfo.description: Drugs A2Z - A Comprehensive Drug Index, Medicine Catalog, Formulation Guide & Quick Drug Reference with Complete Drug Information / Brand Information for Doctors, Nurses, Pharmacists / Chemist, Hospitals / Critical Care Centers and for every common man who is careful about his health and well being.There is on-the-go complete information / compilation of about 50,000 Medicine Brands / Medical Preparations [Trade Names] & 2500+ Drugs [Generic Names] from Indian Pharmacopeia, British Drug Formulary / BNF & US Pharmacopeia (FDA Drugs) with Complete Clinical / Pharmacological & Prescription Details of Drugs & Brands in Full Version of Drugs A2Z. Trial Version is restricted to limited Information.Drugs A2Z - Contains almost double Contents in comparison to other known medical journals / Drug Indexes in the market. The information compiled by doctors is comprehensive yet concise & is useful for general public too apart from the healthcare workers. Now with the ease of use android phones & tabs from anywhere, everyone can access the complete brand & drug informations to support the medical advises & treatment decisions. It is being updated on monthly basis. More & more British & USA brands & drugs are being added to make it one common platform for all important drugs in the world.This Trial Version Contains Information of limited Brands / Trade Names whereas Full Version of Drugs A2Z â Contains about 50,000 Brands [Trade Names] with information containing - Complete Clinical / Pharmacological Details of Drugs with:â¢	Drugâs Mode of Actionâ¢	Cross-Reaction [Interaction Details]â¢	Drug Dosage Schedule & Instructionsâ¢	Indications (Used for)â¢	Contra-Indications (when not to use)â¢	Common Side Effectsâ¢	Special precautions (care to be taken)â¢	Available Brands / Trade Names / Medical Preparationsâ¢	Safety Guidelines for each Drug in Special Condition likeâ¢	During Pregnancyâ¢	During Breast Feeding / Lactationâ¢	In Pediatric / Childrenâ¢	In Elderlyâ¢	In Liver Diseases [Liver Insufficiency]â¢	In Kidney Diseases [Renal Insufficiency]â¢	In Lungs / Respiration Diseases [Pulmonary Insufficiency]Drugs A2Z -
